# privx_script_template (Data Source)

Lookup a PrivX Secrets Manager script template by id or name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "privx_script_template" "linux" {
  name = "Linux Password Rotation"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Script template ID. If set, lookup is done by ID.
- `name` (String) Script template name. If set, lookup is done by name.

### Read-Only

- `operating_system` (String) Operating system for the template (e.g. LINUX).
- `script` (String, Sensitive) Template script content.
